location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.208 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Major Atkins Hamerton, HM's Consul and HC's Agent in the Dominions of HH the Imam of Muscat

mods.abstract: Kemball requests any information that Hamerton may have encountered at Muscat, concerning the act of piracy committed by a Ra's al-Khymah vessel on a Zanzibari vessel.
